s_synopsis: Cowabunga! Take control of your favourite turtle ninjas as you play through the events of the 2007 movie. The turtles have grown apart, and Raphael has taken to crime fighting solo under the guise of the Nightwatcher. The Foot Clan are turning up in the streets again, and a mysterious man known as Winters seems to be involved with them. Only the Ninja Turtles can clean up the streets!
